document.full_text: argentine writer ernesto sabato, whose novel "the tunnel" is hailed as an existentialist classic and who presided over a probe into the crimes committed by the nation's military rulers, died on saturday at age 99.
document.title: argentine writer ernesto sabato dies at age 99
lines_and_colors: argentine writer ernesto sabato, whose novel "the tunnel" is hailed as an existentialist classic and who presided over a probe into the crimes committed by the nation's military rulers, died on saturday at age 99.
